title: Wan Sheng Jie 2
synopsis:
"Dear Mom and Dad, it's already been a year since I left home. Don't worry- I'm doing great! I can take care of myself now. And I've learned to take care of others, too. Before, I never could have imagined having so many friends. But now, I can hardly imagine living without them. I think... Here, is my second home."

It was all a lie.

Suspicion. Betrayal. Conspiracy. 

(Source: PV)
